message: Let's start with a fair split, I'll give you 40% of the money, and we can negotiate further if needed.
You were too generous, I'll take 75%
You wanted 75%, okay, but I'll give you 77.5% this time. Let's meet in the middle!
Getting closer, but I'm not there yet
You're getting close to 80%, but I'm not going to give you 80%. This is my final offer, take it or leave it!
